From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Film by Michael Zaiko Hall
Peter Five EightTheatrical posterDirected byMichael Zaiko HallWritten byMichael Zaiko HallProduced byMichael Zaiko HallFred ChavezJet JandreauJohn LerchenStarring
Kevin Spacey
Rebecca De Mornay
Jet Jandreau
Jake Weber
CinematographyEric LiberackiEdited byNigel GaltMusic byHarvey DavisProductioncompaniesAscent FilmsMad Honey ProductionsLTD FilmsForever Safe ProductionsDistributed byInvincible EntertainmentRelease date
March 22, 2024 (2024-03-22)
Running time100 minutesCountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Peter Five Eight is a 2024 American Neo-noir thriller film written and directed by Michael Zaiko Hall and starring Kevin Spacey.


Cast[edit]
Kevin Spacey as Peter[1]
Jet Jandreau as Sam[2]
Rebecca De Mornay as Brenda[3]
Jake Weber as Mr. Lock[4]
Production[edit]
Filming occurred in Siskiyou County, California in September 2021.[3]  As of May 2022, the film has been completed.[1]

Release[edit]
Peter Five Eight was released in the United States on March 22, 2024.[5]

References[edit]


^ a b Vlessing, Etan (May 13, 2022). "Kevin Spacey Thriller 'Peter Five Eight' Bound for Cannes". The Hollywood Reporter. Retrieved May 15, 2022.

^ Dick, Jeremy (May 14, 2022). "Kevin Spacey's New Thriller Peter Five Eight is Heading to Cannes". MovieWeb. Retrieved May 15, 2022.

^ a b Nash, Anthony (May 13, 2022). "Kevin Spacey's Peter Five Eight to Be Shopped at Cannes". Comingsoon.net. Retrieved May 15, 2022.

^ Wiseman, Andreas (May 13, 2022). "Another Kevin Spacey Project Is Heading To The Cannes Market In The Shape Of 'Peter Five Eight'". Deadline Hollywood. Retrieved May 15, 2022.

^ Vlessing, Etan (2023-11-17). "Kevin Spacey Thriller 'Peter Five Eight' Sets Release Date Following U.K. Trial". The Hollywood Reporter. Retrieved 2023-11-25.
